me.prettyprint.hom.annotations
Class DefaultAnnotationScanner

java.lang.Object
  me.prettyprint.hom.annotations.DefaultAnnotationScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnnotationScanner
public class DefaultAnnotationScanner
extends Object
implements AnnotationScanner

Scan for classes annotated with an annotation. The scan starts in the given package root so it doesn't need to scan through the entire package structure.

Author:
Todd Burruss
